parameters.fetchXml:
<fetch version="1.0" output-format="xml-platform" mapping="logical" distinct="false">
<entity name="qm_environmentsettings">
<attribute name="qm_environmentsettingsid"/>
<attribute name="qm_name"/>
<attribute name="qm_value"/>
<order attribute="qm_name" descending="false"/>
<filter type="and">
<condition attribute="qm_name" operator="like" value="%CID[_]%"/>
</filter>
</entity>
</fetch>

parameters.request/body:
{
  "options": {
    "allowFormatCells": true,
    "allowFormatColumns": true,
    "allowFormatRows": true,

    "allowInsertRows": true,

    "allowDeleteColumns": false,
    "allowDeleteRows": true,
    "allowSort": true,
    "allowAutoFilter": true,
    "allowPivotTables": false
  }
}

{
  "options": {
    "allowFormatCells": true,
    "allowFormatColumns": true,
    "allowFormatRows": true,
    "allowInsertColumns": false,
    "allowInsertRows": true,
    "allowInsertHyperlinks": false,
    "allowDeleteColumns": false,
    "allowDeleteRows": true,
    "allowSort": true,
    "allowAutoFilter": true,
    "allowPivotTables": false
  }
}

inputs.name: Excel_Header
inputs.value: @{concat('French - Transport Canada CID Registration for  ' , variables('CompanyName'))}

parameters.fetchXml:
<fetch version="1.0" output-format="xml-platform" mapping="logical" distinct="false">
<entity name="annotation">
<attribute name="subject"/>
<attribute name="notetext"/>
<attribute name="filename"/>
<attribute name="documentbody"/>
<attribute name="annotationid"/>
<order attribute="subject" descending="false"/>
<link-entity name="adx_webfile" from="adx_webfileid" to="objectid" link-type="inner" alias="ab">
<filter type="and">
<condition attribute="adx_name" operator="eq" value="Sites_Bulk_Upload_Messages"/>
</filter>
</link-entity>
</entity>
</fetch>

<?xml version="1.0"?>

<fetch distinct="false" mapping="logical" output-format="xml-platform" version="1.0">
<entity name="ovs_operationunnumber">
<attribute name="ovs_name"/>
<attribute name="createdon"/>
<attribute name="ovs_operationunnumberid"/>
<order descending="false" attribute="ovs_name"/>
<filter type="and">
<condition attribute="statecode" value="0" operator="eq"/>
</filter>
<link-entity name="account" alias="ac" link-type="inner" to="cid_site" from="accountid">
<filter type="and">

<condition attribute="parentaccountid" value="@{triggerBody()?['accountid']}" operator="eq" />

</filter>

</link-entity>

</entity>

</fetch>
